posts.post_title: WTTF a pre-war HOF'er... T205, T206 preferred TRADED
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bryon
THIS CARD IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE FOR TRADE

I'm looking to trade this 1940 Play Ball #87 Carl Hubbell PSA 7. I'd probably most like to pick up another graded pre-war HOF'er card of comparable value... something from T205 or T206 would be great... but I'm open to considering any and all trade ideas.


[IMG]http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t275/Elemenopeo/Trading%20up%20to%20Mantle/File4948.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t275/Elemenopeo/Trading%20up%20to%20Mantle/File4949.jpg[/IMG]

posts.post_title: WTTF a pre-war HOF'er... T205, T206 preferred TRADED
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bryon
Long story short... Last September, I began a project to try to trade my way from a dime-a-dozen card to a 1952 Topps Mickey Mantle. I started with a raw 1986 Topps #418 Alan Knicely and have since made my way to the 1940 Play Ball Hubbell. If interested, you can read more about my project here...

<a href="http://www.tradingcarddb.com/52MantleProject.cfm" target="_new" rel="nofollow">[url]http://www.tradingcarddb.com/52MantleProject.cfm</a[/url]>
